name: Hertwill ‑ EU Dropshipping
author: Hertwill

sections.description:
Dropship premium products from European brands and suppliers, all offered at wholesale prices, with the Hertwill plugin for WooCommerce stores. The Hertwill plugin allows you to seamlessly sync products to your store, receive automated stock updates, and enjoy automated order fulfillment.

Winning Products

Stand out with our unique selection: 95% of our products are manufactured in Europe, and none come from AliExpress. Every product, backed by a 2-year warranty, comes from trusted brands, ensuring quality and customer satisfaction.

Start Free

Begin your dropshipping journey with our free plan. No credit card required.

Fulfillment & Quick Delivery

Let us handle the logistics. We manage all orders, eliminating the need for your own warehouse or inventory. Our products are shipped from European warehouses, guaranteeing fast delivery.

Product Information and Marketing Materials

Gain access to detailed product descriptions, as well as professional marketing pictures and videos.

You Are Not Alone

Hertwill is more than just a provider—we’re your partner. We’re dedicated to supporting and collaborating with online stores, guiding you towards a successful business every step of the way.
sections.faq:
Is Hertwill free?

Hertwill offers a free plan with no credit card required. Check out Hertwill’s plans here.

What makes Hertwill different from other dropshipping plugins?

All the products we offer come from high-quality European brands and are shipped directly from European warehouses.

Do I need a Hertwill account to use the Hertwill WooCommerce plugin?

Yes, a Hertwill account is required to use our WooCommerce plugin. You can easily create a free account by visiting our website.

How much are top stores making partnering with Hertwill?

Top stores are making over €300K annually.

Can I sell products provided by Hertwill if I am already selling products from other suppliers?

Yes.

In which regions is Hertwill available?

Hertwill is available for online stores that sell to the European Union, United Kingdom, and United States. Read more detailed information on the Shipping page.

What is dropshipping?

Dropshipping is an order fulfillment method where a store doesn’t keep the products it sells in stock. Instead, the seller purchases inventory as needed from a third party—usually a wholesaler or manufacturer—to fulfill orders. In short, the order will be shipped directly to the end customer after you make the sale. All the products we provide at Hertwill are available via dropshipping.

short_description: Connect your WooCommerce store to Hertwill for seamless product sync and order fulfillment through webhooks.
